Package com.github.wuic.exception.xml

This package contains all exceptions related to wuic.xml path.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
WuicXmlBadReferenceException Thrown when an attribute a value that does not references a value known by the current context.
WuicXmlBadReferenceToDaoBuilderException Thrown when an attribute a value that does not references a value known by the current context.
WuicXmlBadTypeOfValueException Thrown when a value of an element is not a type of an expected class in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlException Thrown when an error related the the wuic.xml path occurs.
WuicXmlMissingConfigurationElementException Thrown when an element is not properly defined for a configuration in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoAttributeException Thrown when an attribute is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoClassAttributeException Thrown when an class is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoConfigurationIdAttributeException Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for a configuration in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoIdAttributeException Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for an element in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoNutDaoBuilderClassAttributeException Thrown when a class is not properly defined for a nut dao builder in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlNoNutDaoBuilderIdAttributeException Thrown when an ID is not properly defined for a nut DAO builder in wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlReadException A 'WuicXmlReadException' is a default exception thrown when a wuic.xml path could not be read properly.
WuicXmlUnableToInstantiateException Thrown when a class could not be instantiated in the wuic.xml path.
WuicXmlWorkflowIdentifierException Thrown a workflow does not reference one and only one of both 'idPrefix' and 'id' attributes.
WuicXmlWrappedErrorCodeException Simple WuicXmlException based on a delegated ErrorCode.
 

Package com.github.wuic.exception.xml Description

This package contains all exceptions related to wuic.xml path.

Author:
Guillaume DROUET
